description: System-generated unique identifier for this ancillary cost type used on work orders, invoices, or similar transactions.
Descriptive name of the ancillary fee shown on transactions, lists, and reports.
Reference to the cost category that groups this type for reporting, accounting, and rule application; foreign key to the category master.
Default charge amount for this cost type. Currency and tax treatment follow system settings; can be overridden on a transaction; likely a default valueâ€”confirm with SME.
Boolean flag indicating whether this cost is automatically added to applicable transactions without manual selection.
Indicates the cost type is inactive/retired and hidden from new use while retaining historical records.
